name: We'll Be Home Soon
description:
We'll Be Home Soon is a an action packed clean up game where you have just thrown the greatest party of the century but your parents are now on their way home. Can you clean up the house before they get back?

Your overbearing parents will call you periodically. Your response will change how quickly they come home.

Note: We at The Brant Initiative give ourselves a month to finish each game and what we have we post on itch. Version 0.8 is a complete game that could have some more polish. We might continue building on this some time in the future.

Known Problems: 

- The Duck Speaker can be hard to turn off (Hit box is small).

- You can't be too close to trash when picking up.

Controls: 

W/A/S/d - Movement

LMB - Grab Object

E - Interact With Doors

ECS - Exit Menu

Install Instructions:

(Windows)

  1. Download the Windows version 
  2. Right click the zip file and "extract all"
  3. Run We'll Be Home Soon.exe
